dashboardOnlyKey: {{key, code}} can only be configured through the web dashboard (<https://foxxie.rshk.me/dash>)

detailedDescription.extendedHelp: Allows you to configure Foxxie from Discord, as a quick alternative to the [web dashboard](https://foxxie.rshk.me/dash).
detailedDescription.reminder: There are keys and groups, keys that are within a group are named by `GroupName.KeyName`.

get: The value for the key {{key, bold}} is: {{value, code}}
getNoExist: The key {{key, bold}} does not seem to exist.
menuInvalidAction: Invalid Action, please try again with any of the following options.
menuInvalidKey: Invalid Key, please try again with any of the following options.
menuRenderNoKeys: There are no configurable keys for this folder
menuRenderSelect: Please type in any of the following entries' names
menuNoChange: The value for {{key, bold}} was already that value.
reset: The key {{key, bold}} has been reset to: {{value, code}}
